forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 87. South southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. West southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 64. Northwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
